casebody.data:
Jason BREE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 29, 2019 Freesia Singngam Waldron, deputy assistant public defender, in support of the petition. James M. Ralls, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Jason Bree's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 411 , 207 A.3d 539 (2019), is denied.
